body:
# Cowgill Events

**Weekdays** (usual locations)

* M: Womxn Run The Herd 6:00pm (Brooks TH)
* T: Graze & Chill- run & potluck - monthly
* W:  Werkout Wednesday 6:30am (Lower Woodland Park track)
* Th: Thirsty Thursday 6:30am (Issaquah)
* Thirsty Seconds 6:30pm (North Transfer Station Playground)

**Weekends**

* Smooth Mooves - trail adventures - monthly
* Grazing 101 - beginner-focused trail run - quarterly
* Silky & Filthy - run with folding saws and clear trails
* Volunteering - aid stations at races etc - frequently

  ![A group of trail runners at the trailhead before a Smooth Mooves group run.](/media/img_7348-1-.jpg "Smooth Mooves Teanaway 2022")
metaDescription: View the weekly schedule of fun running events hosted by Cowgill. Join group runs on Thursdays, workouts on Wednesdays, and longer weekend trail runs.
